subject: Posting in Quickscript
msgSnippet: Hallelujah! I was able to figure out how to post in scripts.  If you need to know, here are the answers!  Following in Junior.ttf: wan wE tM pOst in
messageBody:
Hallelujah!
 
I was able to figure out how to post in scripts.  If you need to know, here are the answers!  Following in Junior.ttf:
 
wan wE tM pOst in /kwikskript iz tM jMz /ytlUk Or /ytluk /ekspes.
 
H font kan bI cEngd At wil fram H kIbOrd WFl kampOziN. 
 
Its Just as easy as changing any other font!
 
Unfortunately, I do not know how to do what is possible in HTML, to specify any of several fonts...
 
In shavian documents posted to the internet, it is often possible to specify a list of fonts, looking for one or another, but giving a preference list in the document.  Any advice in how to do this in postings without having to write in html would be appreciated.
 
/rik
